unnormalised: **Brand Baaraat: Social Media Buzzing with Collabs!**
normalised: **Brand Baaraat: Social Media Buzzing with Collaborations!**

unnormalised: Social media's lit AF with brand collaborations, especially now that Diwali's right around the corner! Influencer marketing is BOOMING, yaar. From your fav fashion bloggers rocking Sabyasachi's new line with Myntra, to foodies showcasing biryani recipes using Tata Sampann spices, brands are going all out.
normalised: Social media's lit as f with brand collaborations, especially now that Diwali's right around the corner! Influencer marketing is booming, yaar. From your favorite fashion bloggers rocking Sabyasachi's new line with Myntra, to foodies showcasing biryani recipes using T A T A Sampann spices, brands are going all out.

unnormalised: Remember last Onam when Kerala Tourism teamed up with Mohanlal for that epic campaign? That’s the level we're talking about. Even smaller businesses are getting in on the action, partnering with micro-influencers to reach specific niches. Like, your local chaiwala collaborating with a travel vlogger exploring hidden gems in Lucknow!
normalised: Remember last Onam when Kerala Tourism teamed up with Mohanlal for that epic campaign? That’s the level we're talking about. Even smaller businesses are getting in on the action, partnering with micro-influencers to reach specific niches. Like, your local chaiwala collaborating with a travel vlogger exploring hidden gems in Lucknow!

unnormalised: Experts say this trend is only going to get bigger. Think AI-powered influencer matching platforms and hyper-personalized campaigns targeting every single one of us. So get ready for your feed to be flooded with even more #sponsored content! Just hope it's not all trying to sell you fairness creams, eh? We need some *diversity* in these collabs!
normalised: Experts say this trend is only going to get bigger. Think A I-powered influencer matching platforms and hyper-personalized campaigns targeting every single one of us. So get ready for your feed to be flooded with even more hash sponsored content! Just hope it's not all trying to sell you fairness creams, eh? We need some *diversity* in these collabs!
